query: WITH entities AS (SELECT collateralization_state, approval_process_id, id FROM core_credit_facility_proposals WHERE ((collateralization_state = $1) AND (COALESCE((approval_process_id, id) > ($4, $3), $3 IS NULL))) ORDER BY approval_process_id ASC, id ASC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $5 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_credit_facility_proposal_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.approval_process_id asc, i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
